lore.overview: Lore is an experiment in the world of collective storytelling. It exists to create worlds. To create new universes in our collective imagination.
lore.body: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews. Iterative approaches to corporate strategy foster collaborative thinking to further the overall value proposition. Organically grow the holistic world view of disruptive innovation via workplace diversity and empowerment.

bit.overview: ByBit created BitDAO which created Mantle, the ethereum L2. We helped them create NFT & DeFi products to get their R&D lab Windranger off the ground.
bit.body: Leverage agile frameworks to provide a robust synopsis for high level overviews.
